titleStmt.title: Englands monarchy asserted, and proved to be the freest state, and the best common-wealth throughout the world. With a word to the present authority, and His Excellency General Monck.
titleStmt.author: Peirce, Edmund, Sir, d. 1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W.G. for Richard Lowndes at the White Lion in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 8 1659"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
The final leaf is a blank.
